1) This is the real deal, see Harieje's comments here: http://forum.insanelymac.com/index.php?showtopic=24308

2) The disk image expands to 5.05 GB.

3) This is a Univerisal Binary (UB), x86 and PPC.

4) This might not work on G3's.

5) On PPC Mac's is possible to install this without burning a disk by copying the image to a hard drive partition.

To get this to fit on one single DVD
download Carbon Copy Cloner,
create a new emtpy disc image (4.7 Gb) from disc utility.
Then use Carbon Copy Cloner to clone
from this Image (you must mount i first)
to your new created, but exclude Xcode Tools from this image by select it in Carbon Copy Cloner and then press the lite red buttom at top right. Then clone, you might get a error, but just click OK.

I also tried to start up the comp while pressing the c key, but this didnt work either, it wouldnt boot from the disk. 

I burnt a double layer dvd for leopard with disk utility, and as far as i can see in the finer, the disk seems ok.
